item.title: Ground rents to be capped at Â£250 a year for leaseholders
item.description: The reforms for England and Wales also include proposals to ban the sale of new leasehold flats.

item.title: UK can't ignore China, says Starmer ahead of Beijing trip
item.description: The prime minister insists the UK will not be forced to choose between China and the United States.

item.title: Tearful Carol Kirkwood announces she will leave BBC
item.description: The 63-year-old said it had been an "absolute privilege" to bring viewers the weather every day.

item.title: Labour MPs call for halt to business rate rise for music venues
item.description: Nearly 50 MPs have written to the chancellor calling for music venues to be exempted from a hike in business rates.

item.title: Traitors winner Rachel 'heartbroken' following mum's death
item.description: Writing on Instagram, Rachel Duffy said she was "heartbroken" at the death of her "beautiful wee mummy".
